body: This change (and 3 other above) are no longer atomic. You haven't marked the `refcount` member as `std::atomic`, so it is unsafe now!
body_html: This change (and 3 other above) are no longer atomic. You haven't marked the refcount member as std::atomic, so it is unsafe now!
